beta.description.1.message: **PreMiD Beta** is nou beskikbaar vir almal!

beta.description.2.message: Wat sal u kry as u inteken?

beta.features.2.message: Toegang tot PreMiD se super geheime teks kanale

beta.features.3.message: 'n Spesiale rol in ons se Discord bediener

beta.register.text.message: Klaar daarvoor? Sluit aan by {0} ander Beta Toetsers!
beta.register.text.description: {0} will be replaced with the beta testers count -> is a variable

thankyou.description.message: One ape werk daaraan om u so vinnig as moontlik by ons beta program te kry. Dankie dat u geregistreer het!

error.noslots.message: Dit lyk asof ons nie meer beta slots oop het nie.
error.noslots.description: Shows when the beta slots are full.
